blocks.name: 1hegrlfgr
blocks.content: A graph ` G ` with one hyperedge joining at least two vertices is a loop-free graph. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 1hegrlfgr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), csn(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cpw(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ciedg, c0), csn(cop(c1, c6))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cpr(c4, c5), c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(ciedg, c0), csn(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wf(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))))
  fssd(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), csn(c6), w0)
  syl(w0, wf(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), csn(c6)), wf1o(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), csn(c6)))
  syl2anc(w0, wf1o(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), csn(c6)), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c6, cpw(c2)))
  f1osng(c1, c3, c6, cpw(c2))
  f1of(csn(cop(c1, c6)), csn(c1), csn(c6))
  snssd(c6, crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), w0)
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c6, crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))))), wcel(c6, cpw(c2)), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c6)))
  nehash2(c6, cpw(c2), c4, c5, w0)
  sseldd(c4, c6, cpr(c4, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c4, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c4, c2))
  prid1g(c4, c2, c5)
  sseldd(c5, c6, cpr(c4, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c5, c2))
  prid2g(c5, c2, c4)
  elrab(s0, c6, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0))), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c6)))
  breq2d(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)), cfv(chash, c6), wceq(cv(s0), c6))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c6, chash)
  feq1d(cfv(ciedg, c0), csn(c1), crab(s0, cpw(c2), wbr(nat2, cle, cfv(chash, cv(s0)))), csn(cop(c1, c6)), w0)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, nat2, cle, cfv(chash, c6))
  diff.nat2.s(s0)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, chash, c6)
  diff.chash.s(s0)
}
